text: you shouldn't do work on the bed because your brain will associate it with sleeping, and you'll end up either falling asleep or having poor sleep quality when you actually sleep at night. Here are my suggestions: 1) Go to a park nearby, and find a table with a bench if you're really really desperate, **2) Set up a seat on the floor of your room or on a chair in your room, and buy a lap desk from Amazon (these really work well),** or 3) tell your family to shut the fuck up unless they want you to fail school.
Is anyone selling a Stanford parking pass? please reply to this or message me!
